data.message: Dear Mark I would like to thank you about facebook. I mean it's cool to have acess in all of those information! By change I discovered lot's of things about space through here, wich I could't ever imagine! And facebook gave me the motivation..not google! lol. So I think that you are a good person. And it was a nice idea to create facebook. :P

replies.message: Thanks for the compliment, Sofia! We're happy to hear you're enjoying your Facebook experience. -Hailey
